DarkMouse::

She heard Galvatron bark out orders.  She jumped out of her seat and 
ran down the hall towards the armory.  She slid down the flight of 
stairs and ran into the room.  She grabbed a photon rifle.  She ran 
back to the bridge. It was then her logic circuits twitched. She 
tried to sound sincere in her question,"Pardon my ignorance 
Galvatron,but if the sensors are correct, and the base is actually 
inside a volcano, how do we get inside? Won't we melt our mother 
boards just getting that close to the molten lava before actually 
getting inside? Or is there another way into the base? I only want to 
understand the logistics of this, so I can help out better than I did 
last time. I wasn't very helpful last time around. So I wish to prove 
myself this time." she said, holding her head up and her optics 
looking at Galvatron.
